name: SpeedWagon's Adventure
description:
This game is a easy platformer game made for

https://itch.io/jam/jojo-jam

: And the secondary theme is "Range".

How to play

Move by Left arrow, Right arrow, Up arrow and Down arrow.

Of course you also can use A, D, W and S.

Jump : Space

Throw Hat : Use mouse to aim and throw.

Target

Get more more score by catch drop item at 60 sec.

Be care for the danger weapon - ax( yes, some item will reduce score!!!)

I have no time to create more enemy or system, forgive me, SpeedWagon. T_T
